name: lib
purpose: The root directory for all Dart code in the Flutter project.

children.name: project
children.purpose: Contains project-wide files and configurations that are not specific to any feature.

children.name: app
children.purpose: Core application setup, including routing and main application widget.

children.name: base_widgets
children.purpose: Common and reusable widgets shared across multiple features.

children.name: dependencies
children.purpose: Dependency injection setup and configuration for the entire project.

children.name: exports
children.purpose: Barrel files that export commonly used files for easier importing.

children.name: extensions
children.purpose: Dart extension methods to add new functionality to existing classes.

children.name: global_params
children.purpose: Global parameters, constants, and configurations for the application.

children.name: localization
children.purpose: Localization and internationalization files for supporting multiple languages.

children.name: logger
children.purpose: Logging utilities and configurations for debugging and monitoring.

children.name: theme
children.purpose: Application-wide theme data, including colors, fonts, and styles.

children.name: text
children.purpose: Application-wide text styles and font data

children.name: utils
children.purpose: Utility functions and helper classes that are used across the project.

children.name: features
children.purpose: Contains all the features of the application, with each feature being a self-contained module.
